General.Name: Woorim Machinery Co. Ltd
General.Industry: Machinery, Tools, Heavy Vehicles, Trains & Ships
General.Description: WOORIM POWER TRAIN SOLUTION Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells transmissions, reducers, wind power generator parts, and gears primarily in South Korea. The company was formerly known as Woorim Machinery Co., Ltd. and changed its name to WOORIM POWER TRAIN SOLUTION Co., Ltd. in September 2021. WOORIM POWER TRAIN SOLUTION Co., Ltd. was founded in 1976 and is based in Changwon, South Korea.

0.Name: Mr. Hyun-Seok  Han
0.Title: Chief Exec. Officer and Representative Director
